Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory270.png'}
{3: 'After searching for a moment, Vera uncovers a secret door behind a huge bookcase.'}
{3: 'They quickly break down the bookcase and open the access point.'}
{3: 'A mildewy odor of rotting paper comes out from the depths of the corridor. No. 21 sniffs the odor... then sneezes quietly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Looks like we've found our target, eh? Pup?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera jokes. To distract herself from what has just happened, No. 21 forces herself to focus on the task at hand and nods sternly.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory299.png'}
{3: 'The two of them proceed along the corridor into the underground archive.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "All the files here are kept on paper... Watch your step. Don't break anything.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The underground archive is considerably more cramped than the upper level. Stacks of sallow documents are piled on the ground, smelling of mildew.'}
{3: 'No. 21 wrinkles her nose, sniffing the odor in an attempt to remember this peculiar smell.'}

{3: 'Vera goes straight to the safe in the middle of the archive. She jams her blade into the lock and, after wiggling it several times, hears a satisfying click as it opens. She opens the safe and takes out a stack of documents from within.'}
{3: 'Her eyes shift to the "TOP SECRET" written in bold red on a file and checks the date on one of the corners.'}
{3: 'After confirming the other documents, she takes the entire stack and stuffs them into a sealed waterproof pouch.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'No. 21, what are you doing?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 is huddled over a dead spider lying on its back, trying to sniff it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "First off, that's not a bug. And if you like it so much, there's a billion others in our basement back at HQ. You can spend the night there if you want...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Really? Okay.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "...Anyway, mission complete. Let's get out of here.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '2'}

{3: 'No. 21 stands up. The two walk toward the exit, but right as the pouch containing the documents crosses the threshold, an ear-piercing alarm begins to buzz. Suddenly, the floor beneath them begins to rumble faintly.'}
{3: 'Vera lifts up the pouch and looks up to see a faint optical scanner at the exit.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...Damn it! It's a trap!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'What should we do?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Run as fast you can! We need to get the hell outta hereâ€”!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "The room's caving in!", 4: '1'}
